Date: Thursday, 5/1/1991
Subject: Status of Pedro Echevarria
Dear Sir,
Pedro Echevarria isn't hitting the ball at all at AA Sticky Wicketts!
He has an AVG of .217, so a demotion is
the right choice. He shouldn't be emberassed any more.

Regards,
Scouting Director



Date: Thursday, 5/1/1991
Subject: Status of Jaime Alvarez
Dear Sir,
Jaime Alvarez shouldn't play at AA Sticky Wicketts!
He has an AVG of .195 over there, that might
be a sign that he has been promoted to soon. You
should demote him before he gets burned.

Regards,
Scouting Director

the right choice. He shouldn't be emberassed any more.

Regards,

Date: Saturday, 5/3/1991
Subject: Playing time
I'd like to complain about my playing time, I think
I am a pretty good player, so why am I no
regular in your lineups?

Regards,
Granville Sanders
